SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.citytechinc.cq.component.annotations.widgets
Annotation Type Selection

@Retention(value=CLASS)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface Selection

Specifies a selection type Widget. A selection may be one of

  1. select
  2. radio
  3. checkbox
  4. combobox
Represents a Widget of type CQ.form.Selection

Optional Element Summary
 Option[] options
          An explicitly enumerated set of options for the selection.
 String optionsProvider
          A function or the name of a function that will be called on processRecords to receive the options.
 String optionsUrl
          The URL from which options are to be pulled.
 String sortDir
          The sort direction of the the options.
 String type
          The type of the selection.
 

options

public abstract Option[] options
An explicitly enumerated set of options for the selection. Note: if your options are returned dynamically via a URL, use the optionsUrl property.

Returns:
Default:
{}

optionsUrl

public abstract String optionsUrl
The URL from which options are to be pulled. Note: setting this to anything other than an empty string overrides any settings made in the options property.

Returns:
Default:
""

optionsProvider

public abstract String optionsProvider
A function or the name of a function that will be called on processRecords to receive the options. The function must return an array of options.

Returns:
String
See Also:
Options
Default:
""

sortDir

public abstract String sortDir
The sort direction of the the options. If "ASC" or "DESC" the options will be sorted by its (internationalized) text.

Returns:
String
Default:
""

type

public abstract String type
The type of the selection. One of "checkbox", "radio", "select" or "combobox". "checkbox" is the only type that supports mulitple values.

Returns:
String
Default:
"radio"
